OperationMap.longDescription: List mapping between HTTP method and privilege required for entity.
OperationMap.description: List mapping between HTTP method and privilege required for entity.

PropertyOverrides.longDescription: Indicates privilege overrides of property or element. e.g., password property.
PropertyOverrides.description: Indicates privilege overrides of property or element within a entity.

ResourceURIOverrides.longDescription: Indicates privilege overrides of Resource URI. Target lists Resource URI.
ResourceURIOverrides.description: Indicates privilege overrides of Resource URI.

SubordinateOverrides.longDescription: Indicates privilege overrides of subordinate resource. Target lists referenced by Entity.
SubordinateOverrides.description: Indicates privilege overrides of subordinate resource.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Mapping.longDescription: This type shall describe a mapping between an entity and the relevant privileges used to access it.
Mapping.description: This type describes a mapping between an entity and the relevant privileges used to access it.

PATCH.longDescription: Indicates privilege required for HTTP PATCH operation.
PATCH.description: Indicates privilege required for HTTP PATCH operation.

GET.longDescription: Indicates privilege required for HTTP GET operation.
GET.description: Indicates privilege required for HTTP GET operation.

HEAD.longDescription: Indicates privilege required for HTTP HEAD operation.
HEAD.description: Indicates privilege required for HTTP HEAD operation.

POST.longDescription: Indicates privilege required for HTTP POST operation.
POST.description: Indicates privilege required for HTTP POST operation.

PUT.longDescription: Indicates privilege required for HTTP PUT operation.
PUT.description: Indicates privilege required for HTTP PUT operation.

DELETE.longDescription: Indicates privilege required for HTTP DELETE operation.
DELETE.description: Indicates privilege required for HTTP DELETE operation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

OperationMap.longDescription: This type shall describe the specific privileges required for a set of HTTP operations.
OperationMap.description: Used for describing the specific privileges for a set of HTTP operations.

Targets.longDescription: Indicates the set of URI(s) or Entity(s) or property(s). e.g./redfish/v1/Systems/1, Manager, Password. When targets property is not mentioned, then there is no override.

OperationMap.longDescription: List mapping between HTTP operation and privilege needed to perform operation.
OperationMap.description: List mapping between HTTP operation and privilege needed to perform operation.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

Target_PrivilegeMap.longDescription: This type shall describe a mapping between one or more targets and the HTTP operations associated with them.
Target_PrivilegeMap.description: This type describes a mapping between one or more targets and the HTTP operations associated with them.

Privilege.longDescription: This array shall contain a set of strings that match 0 or more of the strings found in the PrivilegesUsed and OEMPrivilegesUsed properties.
Privilege.description: Lists the privileges that are allowed to perform the given type of HTTP operation on the entity type.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

OperationPrivilege.longDescription: This type shall describe the specific privileges required for a given type of HTTP operation.
OperationPrivilege.description: Used for describing the specific privileges for a given type of HTTP operation.

PrivilegesUsed.description: Lists the set of Redfish standard priviliges used in building this mapping.

OEMPrivilegesUsed.description: Lists the set of OEM Priviliges used in building this mapping.

Oem.longDescription: The value of this string shall be of the format for the reserved word *Oem*.
Oem.description: This is the manufacturer/provider specific extension moniker used to divide the Oem object into sections.

^([a-zA-Z_][a-zA-Z0-9_]*)?@(odata|Redfis.description: This property shall specify a valid odata or Redfish property.

PrivilegeRegistry.longDescription: This resource shall be used to represent operation to privilege mappings.
PrivilegeRegistry.description: This is the schema definition for Operation to Privilege mapping.

title: #PrivilegeRegistry.v1_0_1.PrivilegeRegistry
